channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: Interdepartmental Teaching Office remote reception on Friday, November 7th 2025
item.description: On Friday November 7th, 2025, the student services for the degree courses Law and Sciences of Legal Services will be available remotely only, via MS Teams (please click on the following link) or by phone at 02-50312473, from 9:30 to 12:00.%0A

item.title: Italian Erasmus
item.description: Italian Erasmus is a national mobility programme that allows students to carry out mobility periods at other affiliated Italian universities.%0AThe call for applications for the second semester and all other information are available on the Italian Erasmus page.%0ADeadline for applications: 12 November 2025.%0A

item.title: Provisional rankings Scholarships a.y. 2025/26

item.title: Call for the C1 Advanced (CAE) exam on 16 + 17 December 2025 - SOLD OUT
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English C1 Advanced (CAE) exam scheduled on 16 + 17 December 2025.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Open semester: course schedules and attendance
Dual Career programme for student-athletes
item.description: As of 15 July 2025, students can submit their application for the Dual Career programme, aimed at supporting high-level athletes in balancing their competitive sports commitments with university career.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it
